get.description: 登录页路由：若无 session 则分配唯一 user_id。

post.description:
如果提供了 eth_address 或 public_key，则不强制提供密码。
如果提供了 username 或 uuid，并且没有提供 eth_address 或 public_key，则需要提供密码进行注册。

统一 Markdown 渲染接口：
- 如果 data 是 str 或 {"text": str} → 渲染普通 Markdown
- 如果 data 是 dict 或 list[dict] → 渲染结构化 summary Markdown

返回 insert / update 类型的模型判定样本，用于人工标注处理。
自动排除已标注或已入库模板的样本。

get.description: 查询模板，支持筛选路径、来源、状态。

schema.title: Response List Templates Ideatech Templates List Get

post.description: 确认分类并更新模板库,人工确认 insert/update 的操作, status True 表示同意，False 表示拒绝

登录路由，颁发访问令牌和刷新令牌,令牌生成 login_for_access_token,
如果 eth_address 或 public_key 认证成功，通过公钥验证签名则不需要密码。
使用 username 或 uuid 和密码登录。
防止伪造 API Key,防止请求内容被篡改,防止重放攻击（时间戳）,避免签名泄露,HMAC 使用安全算法（SHA256）
一般认证需求,访问控制
通过 API Key 登录，验证后返回 JWT Token 并写入 Cookie。
安全登出接口：清除后端 Cookie。

返回 OpenAI 兼容的 tools 定义，并调用模型接口后解析执行结果。
如果 request.tools 为空且 request.user 存在，则从 Redis 获取用户缓存的 tools。否则调用 AI 自动生成 tool 元数据。
最终根据 messages 与 tools 调用大模型，解析 tool_call 执行结果并返回。

get.description:
获取用户消息历史：
1. 优先从 JWT token（Authorization / cookie / query）中识别真实用户；
2. 否则使用 session 内的 user_id 作为匿名访客；

parameters.name: stream

schema.description: Enable streaming response if set to True.
schema.title: Stream

parameters.description: Enable streaming response if set to True.

parameters.name: temperature

schema.description: Controls randomness. Lower values make output more focused and deterministic, while higher values increase creativity.
schema.title: Temperature

parameters.description: Controls randomness. Lower values make output more focused and deterministic, while higher values increase creativity.

parameters.name: top_p

schema.description: Nucleus sampling parameter. Limits the response to the smallest set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds this value.
schema.title: Top P

parameters.description: Nucleus sampling parameter. Limits the response to the smallest set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds this value.

parameters.name: max_tokens

schema.description: The maximum number of tokens the model can generate in the response.
schema.title: Max Tokens

parameters.description: The maximum number of tokens the model can generate in the response.

parameters.name: thinking

schema.description: Number of thinking tokens. 0 disables thinking; >0 enables thinking and adds token budget.
schema.title: Thinking

parameters.description: Number of thinking tokens. 0 disables thinking; >0 enables thinking and adds token budget.

parameters.name: prompt

schema.description: The initial context or system message to guide the AI's behavior.
schema.title: Prompt

parameters.description: The initial context or system message to guide the AI's behavior.

parameters.name: question

schema.description: The main question or user prompt for the AI to respond to.
schema.title: Question

parameters.description: The main question or user prompt for the AI to respond to.

parameters.name: agent

schema.description: Contextual identifier for different use cases, enabling selection of appropriate system behavior.
schema.title: Agent

parameters.description: Contextual identifier for different use cases, enabling selection of appropriate system behavior.

parameters.name: model_name

schema.description: Specify the model to use, e.g., moonshot,glm,qwen,doubao,spark,ernie,baichuan,lingyiwanwu,hunyuan,deepseek,minimax,mistral,jina,gemini,grok,claude,silicon,modelscope,aihubmix,tokenflux,othree,zzz or custom models.
schema.title: Model Name

parameters.description: Specify the model to use, e.g., moonshot,glm,qwen,doubao,spark,ernie,baichuan,lingyiwanwu,hunyuan,deepseek,minimax,mistral,jina,gemini,grok,claude,silicon,modelscope,aihubmix,tokenflux,othree,zzz or custom models.

parameters.name: model_id

schema.description: An optional model ID for selecting different versions or configurations of a model.
schema.title: Model Id

parameters.description: An optional model ID for selecting different versions or configurations of a model.

parameters.name: extract

post.description:

:param files: 上传的文件列表
:param model_name: 模型名称

callback.title: Callback
callback.description: Callback info: either a URL string, or a dict with url + optional payload/params/headers

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.default: You are a personal math tutor. Write and run code to answer math questions.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords used to guide the retrieval of relevant information or sources based on search terms.

top_p.title: Top P
top_p.description: The probability threshold setting for the model.

max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate.

thinking.title: Thinking
thinking.description: Number of thinking tokens. 0 disables thinking; >0 enables thinking and adds token budget.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The initial system content or prompt used to guide the AI's response.

question.title: Question
question.description: The primary question or prompt for the AI to respond to. If `messages` are provided, this field will be automatically overridden by the last user message content in `messages`. Otherwise, this `question` field will be used directly as the prompt for the AI.

agent.title: Agent
agent.description: System content identifier. This index represents different scenarios or contexts for AI responses, allowing the selection of different system content.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The suffix for the AI to respond to completion.

extract.title: Extract
extract.description: Response Format,The type of content to extract from response(e.g., code.python,code.bash,code.cpp,code.sql,json,header,links)

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Specify the name of the model to be used. It can be any available model, such as 'moonshot', 'glm', 'qwen', 'ernie', 'hunyuan', 'doubao','spark','baichuan','deepseek', or other models.

callback.description: Callback info: a URL string or a dict with url and optional payload,params,headers

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords or tuples of (keyword, function, *args,*kwargs) used to search for relevant information across various sources, A list of tools represented as tuples, where each tuple consists of a callable and its corresponding arguments. such as online searches, database queries, or vector-based search systems. These keywords help guide the retrieval of data based on the specific terms provided.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: This allows the AI to call specific functions with the provided arguments to perform tasks such as data processing, API calls, or other utility operations. Each tool can be invoked to enhance the AI's capabilities and provide more dynamic responses based on the context.

filter_limit.title: Filter Limit
filter_limit.description: The limit count(<0) or max len(>0) to filter historical messages.

filter_time.title: Filter Time
filter_time.description: The timestamp to filter historical messages.

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: A list of message objects representing the current conversation. If no messages are provided and `use_hist` is set to `True`, the system will filter existing chat history using the fields `name`, `user`, and `filter_time`. If `messages` are provided, the last user message will be used as the question.

class_default.title: Class Default
class_default.description: default or last history to fallback.
